Valid.Title: Report confirmed
Valid.Content: Your report has been accepted. Reason: {reason}, malicious level: {malicious_level}.{process_note, select, null {} other { Note: {process_note}}}

Invalid.Title: Report rejected
Invalid.Content: Your report was rejected. Invalid report count in the last 30 days: {false_report_count}.{quota_sub_gb, select, 0 {} other { Upload quota reduced: {quota_sub_gb} GB.}}{ban_days, select, 0 {} other { Account banned for {ban_days} day(s).}}{process_note, select, undefined {} other { Note: {process_note}}}

Penalty.Title: Resource violation notice
Penalty.Content: Your uploaded resource was confirmed as violating policy. Reason: {reason}, malicious level: {malicious_level}.{quota_sub_gb, select, 0 {} other { Upload quota reduced: {quota_sub_gb} GB.}}{ban_days, select, 0 {} other { Account banned for {ban_days} day(s).}}{process_note, select, undefined {} other { Note: {process_note}}}

NewReport.Title: New resource report
NewReport.Content: User {reporter_name} reported a resource uploaded by {reported_user_name}. Reason: {reason}, malicious level: {malicious_level}.
